Mailing Lists

There is also an active mailing list for announces of courses, seminars, meetings or simply day by day news.

To subscribe, unsubscribe or get to the messages archives of the list click here.

To send an email to the mailing list you should create a new "news", "seminar", "event" or "position" object. Once the object is created you can use the [send by email] button to send a message to the mailing list.
Join the News list if you want to keep up-to-date.
This list is basically intended for local users, it will be mainly in italian...
Please, respect netiquette.
